name: .GBSPROJ
summary: Learn about .GBSPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a GBSPROJ file (and the game development project it describes) with GB Studio. To do so:
Select File â†’ Open... from GB Studio's menu bar.
Navigate to and open your GBSPROJ file.
After you open a GBSPROJ file with GB Studio, you can edit, run, and export the game the GBSPROJ file describes. For more information about GB Studio, click here.
If necessary, you can also open a GBSPROJ file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code or any other text editor, to view the JSON-formatted text it contains.
